info.description: A personalized nutrition recommendation system built on the OpenNutrition dataset
info.title: NutriMatch API

post.description: Authenticate a user and return access and refresh tokens
Revoke a refresh token to log out a user
Refresh an expired access token using a valid refresh token
Register a new user in the system

get.description: Search for foods by name or other criteria

post.description: Add or update a user's rating for a food

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific food
Get all profiles for the authenticated user
Get a profile by its ID

delete.description: Delete a profile by its ID

post.description: Create a new profile for a user

get.description: Get personalized food recommendations for the authenticated user

parameters.description: Profile ID to use for recommendations
parameters.name: profileId

get.description: Get alternative food suggestions for a specific food item

post.description: Filter food recommendations based on specific criteria

get.description: Get a list of all allergens
Get a list of all dietary patterns
Get a list of all health conditions

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and the JWT token.
